channel.title: Strange bug in Hammer...
channel.description:
Hello everyone, so there is my problem: I'm actually making a remake of Hong Kong from the first Deus Ex to make an RP map for a friend, so I have custom textures from the original game but I can see trough them in my hammer 3D view ! While stock HL2 Textures are fine.. Here a screenshot : [url=https://www.noelshack.com/2014-34-1408381510-painintheass.png][img]https://image.noelshack.com/minis/2014/34/1408381510-painintheass.png[/img][/url]
But when I compile, there is no texture problem IG... so what's the problem ? :[

item.title: Strange bug in Hammer...
item.dc:creator: Nozoki17
item.description:
Oh well, now there are missing textures everywhere but I can’t see trough, I’m looking to fix that

EDIT: Oh well I’ve reloaded Hammer and that’s fixed ! Thank you very much sir, I think VTFEdit kept that setting from my last window texture…

Read full topic

item.title: Strange bug in Hammer...

item.description:
I removed the “$translucent” 1 but it dosen’t change anything

item.title: Strange bug in Hammer...
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
I’d assume “$translucent” 1 is the culprit since it doesn’t look like the texture has any need for it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange bug in Hammer...
item.dc:creator: Nozoki17
item.description:
Okay, but almost every texture is custom so there is a sample since I’ve only modified the surface…

“LightmappedGeneric”
{
“$basetexture” “floor/pavement01”
“$surfaceprop” “Brick”
“$translucent” 1
}
